section.title: Removed and Deprecated Features and Packages
section.para: This section lists features and packages that were removed from &product; or will be removed in upcoming versions.

section.title: Removed Features and Packages
section.para: The following features and packages have been removed in this release.

section.title: Deprecated Features and Packages
section.para: The following features and packages are deprecated and will be removed with a future service pack of &product;.

listitem.para: Starting with &product; 15 SP1, support for using scores to enforce ordering constraints is deprecated. Use the kind option instead. For more information, see the guide Pacemaker 2. 0 Configuration Explained by the upstream Pacemaker project.
